venue.address_2: Exit 19 off Rte. 495. Turn at BKing
venue.name: DOUBLETREE HOTEL

item.description:
Join us for a special fundraiser: the Project Smile 9th Anniversary Celebration. Event features a tremendous silent auction with over 100 items including:

Jet Blue Airline tix

Autographed sports memorabilia

Pandora bracelet

Daily Show with Jon Stewart VIP tickets

WEEI Sports Radio "Producer for a Day" certificate

TV Diner with Billy Costa, "Diner for a Day" certificate- be featured on the TV Show!

Worcester Sharks experience package

And much more, including golf outings, F1 Racing tickets, kayaking & white water rafting excursions, paintball, hotel stays, restaurant certificates, zoo tickets, jewelry, wine tastings, gift baskets, theater tickets, museum visits, Wayside Inn dinner certificate, beer and more!

Event also features complimentary appetizers/dessert, cash bar, live music, special guest speaker Richard Lodge, Metro West Daily News Editor, special guest Miss Massachusetts, live auction hosted by Dick Ferrucci and debut of the 2013 Project Smile calendar.

Tix are only $15 and include a 2013 calendar. Advanced tix are available at: www.projectsmile.org/events.htm

Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children who are victims of traumatic events. Since founded by meet-up group organizer Catherine, the organization has partnered with 177 police and fire departments, the Dept. of Children and Families and homeless shelters to help thousands of children annually. This event is their largest fundraiser.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the ballroom. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Special Charity Event: Project Smile 9th Anniversary Celebration
